title: Madame Bovary: Classic Collection
description: Emma Bovary is a sensuous, sentimental young woman whose romantic ideals make her dissatisfied with her humdrum married life. Attempting to escape into an exciting world of passion and dreams, she drifts into sordid affairs with Rodolphe Boulanger and LÃ©on Dupuis. The first of these lovers, an older man, dominates the affair, while the second, inexperienced and young, is dominated. The eventual collapse of Emma's romantic dreams is inevitable, and her disillusionment leads ultimately to her doom.Listen to Madame Bovary, narrated by Simon Vance, on your smartphone, notebook or desktop computer.
author: Gustave Flaubert
